translations: （尤指在战争中）掠夺，抢劫；掠夺物

sentences.sentence: There were no signs of violence or pillage.
sentences.translation: 没有暴力和掠夺的迹象。

sentences.sentence: They brought back horrific accounts of murder and pillage.
sentences.translation: 他们带回了残杀掳掠的可怕消息。

sentences.sentence: “They all just pillage, ” says a skeletal man sheltering in a church. “It doesn't matter which side they are on.”
sentences.translation: “所有这些人都会打劫你”，一位躲在教堂里的瘦骨嶙峋的人讲道，“他们这些人代表哪一方无关紧要。”
